Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country? 

The Indian economy is the ever growing economy.Different cultues,languages and traditions has made it more special different from others. Many drastic improvements have taken place in the few decades. Since our independence, it is growing constantly by making improvements in all the fields and reaching new heights. Despite of few hurdels and difficulties, it has always believed in continuous growth and efficient functioning. There are many difficulties which came in the way of its development like poverty, unemployment, illeteracy ect., In the present senario our Indian economy is being effected by Inflation.

      Inflation can be defined as the sudden hike in the prices of goods and services. This rice in price is effecting the Indian market very badly. Inflation effecting the Indian economy both directly and indirectly. Because of the rise in prices of various goods and services people are not in a position to adjust their incomes and hence are foregoing few of their wants. It has become a major problem to the people who are basically below poverty line (BPL) as they are facing difficulty to fulfill their basic needs.

      The Government of India should take necessary actions to control the inflation by introducing subidies on various products and services which help the common man to live peacefully in this competitive economy. The high prices on basic neccesities should be reduced inorder to comfort people so that they can maintain a good standard of living.

       In this way our Indian economy can give a good comeback and function efficiently in all the fields.
